name: EAT LEADEN DEATH, DEMON!
description:
EAT LEADEN DEATH, DEMON! Is a one-button, one-screen first-person shooter where you blast demons with a double barrel shotgun until you either get demon'd up or run out of shot to gun.

FEATURES

  • One Button: EAT LEADEN DEATH, DEMON! Has a singular input, move, reload and fire with any press of any key on your device.
  • Staged Reloads: Every tap is one step of loading your demon-killing device. Break it open, load a shell, load another, close it and tap twice to unload both shells unto whatever poor demon stands in front of you.
  • Never run out of demon to shoot: That tunnel goes on forever and so does that demon supply. How far can you go before your ammo runs out or before the demons get you?
